entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -32.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -32.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -37.9°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 56 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
